name: Intelligent Design: An Evolutionary Sandbox
description: Intelligent Design: An Evolutionary Sandbox is an abstract god game with fully simulated genetics and evolution. Get creative, playing at your own pace, as you experiment with this simulation of an ecosystem. But remember, when you start tampering with genetics it is hard to undo your mistakes...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or 7 Processor: Quad Core @ 2.3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 520 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Large ecosystems may cause performance issues on systems without dedicated graphics cards.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 64 bit Processor: Quad Core @ 3GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
